text: Leonid Vyacheslavovich Kuravlyov (; 8 October 1936 â€“ 30 January 2022) was a Russian actor. He became a People's Artist of the RSFSR in 1976. His best known roles were in Seventeen Moments of Spring, The Meeting Place Cannot Be Changed and Private Detective, or Operation Cooperation. Kuravlyov died from pneumonia caused by dementia at a Moscow hospital on 30 January 2022, at the age of 85.
